title: Game wont patch. Error 004
body:
Reinstalled several times, used the HRT multiple times, reinstalled onto a different hard drive.

Will begin patching and will randomly stop saying it can not continue and brings up error 004.

Spent 2 hours trying to get it to work after not playing for 2 days due to work.

replies.body: This issue can be caused by security setting that's preventing your game files from being used.  A reinstall wouldn't really help because it's not that your game files are bad, but can't be accessed.  Go over the steps in the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot as a first step.  Let me know if you run into any issues, and we'll go from there.

okay, so i finished updating to the new client like normal and it started patching. had on issues. didnt even do the permissions thing.

No clue what the problem was, but after 3 hours, it started working right automatically.

Sadly though, i must leave for work at this time. no games for me.
well, i uninstalled after the last issue so im waiting for the client to update before i continue again. hopefully, it occurs soon due to me having to leave for work shortly
